description:
USDA Organic
Coffee Free
Acid Free
Prebiotic
All Purpose Grind
Vegan
Certified Organic by QAI
Kosher Parve 
Naturally caffeine free - better than decaf
Acid Free - helps restore alkaline balance
Natural energy boost - from nutrients, not stimulants
Heart-healthy potassium - for optimal performance
Prebiotic - Inulin, a soluble fiber in chicory root, supports gut health to improve digestion, elimination and the immune system.
Energizing maca root enhances velvety chocolate layered over a lush, dense body from roasted ramon seeds and chicory roots. 
Enjoy Teeccino's deliciously rich, deep-roasted flavor that delivers all the satisfaction without the caffeine and acidity of coffee! Discover why Teeccino fans describe it as smoother, richer, and creamier than coffee. The secret? French chicory, the roasted root often added to coffee, blended with barley, Italy's favorite caffeine-free roasted brew, and Spanish carob, famed for its chocolaty flavor. Enriched with maca, the Peruvian energizing herb, a cup of Teeccino brims with many health benefits:
Most of Teeccino's ingredients are grown in Europe and the USA. We pioneer new trade for organic chicory with smallholder farmers in India and for wild harvested ramón seeds with rainforest villagers in Central America. These ingredients create economic opportunities where income is scarce. By drinking Teeccino, you join us in supporting families devoted to organic, fair trade values in both developed and emerging countries.
direction: Adjust brewing strength and add milk, non-dairy milk, & sweetener or drink black according to personal preference.
Use 1 rounded Tbsp per 2 cups of water.
Use 1 rounded Tbsp per 10 oz. water.
Permanent filters work best and save trees!
Add 1-2 Tbsp to '3-cup' pots, 3-4 Tbsp to '8-cup' pots. Steep for 3 minutes.
Use double porta-filter and 1-2 rounded Tbsp. Brew according to machine instructions.

Chill brewed Teeccino. Teeccino can last days when refrigerated! Or, make a strong brew by using 2 Tbsp per 2 cups water and pour the hot brew over ice. Add cold milk or nondairy milk and sweeten to taste.
Begin brewing 3/4 coffee to 1/4 Teeccino. Gradually decrease coffee and increase Teeccino until you are caffeine-free!
ingredients: Organic carob, organic barley, organic chicory, organic maca, organic ramón seeds, organic chocolate flavor, organic cocoa, organic chile flakes.
Produced on machinery that also processes almonds.
About gluten: Independent laboratory tests can not detect gluten in brewed Teeccino when using a paper filter or tea bag.

description:
4 Flavors: Black Cherry, Coconut, Grapefruit, Tangerine Chamomile
Featuring Sustainably Sourced Beeswax, Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil & Vitamin E
Formulated to be: USDA Organic, Non-GMO, Cruelty-Free
Made with Eco-Friendly & Biodegradable Ingredients
No Sulfates, No Preservatives, No Artificial Fragrances & No Animal Testing
Certified Organic by Oregon Tilth
Bee good to your Lips!.
Our Sustainable, USDA-Certified Organic Beeswax is sourced from established Bee Farmers who meet our stringent social, environmental and economic requirements.
We purchase our USDA Organic Beeswax from well-established bee farmers, who are often the third or fourth generation in the trade and have learned from decades of hands-on experience. Their livelihood is dependent on the ethical and humane collection of crude wax and honey. These farmers take pride in providing a high quality, consistent products year after year, without endangering bees or other wildlife.
The collection of our Organic Beeswax takes place in organized apiaries, or out in the wild — where collectors do their best to ensure the bees are well cared for. By constantly monitoring the hives, farmers can make certain the bees are healthy and well fed throughout the year, especially during times of drought or frost. Many of our bee farmers use wooden hives, which are hung from trees, so wild animals cannot disturb them.
In addition, the majority of our bee farmers contribute to ongoing government and university-funded research. This crucial research is intended to develop better ways to handle bees, and keep them safe in their natural habitat.
Organic Beeswax is a naturally sustainable product from Mother Nature. It is up to us to protect bees, so that they will continue to pollinate and produce high-quality Organic Beeswax for generations to come.
Enjoy all the

Maca is power. Native to the Andean Region, the maca plant has been used for thousands of years as a whole-food resource for health and vitality. As one of the world's most sought-after adaptogenic superfoods, maca root bolsters the body's ability to adapt to life's physical and emotional stressors. Its powerful nutrients support hormonal and emotional balance, boost energy levels, increase stamina and support fertility and sexual function in both men and women.
The Zint Difference: While maca in its raw form can be difficult for some to digest, our organic maca powder is gelatinized to remove the starch, concentrate the nutrients, and enhance digestibility. We take pride in sourcing our maca from family-owned farms in the Andes mountains of Peru. Our suppliers harvest and sell their produce in accordance with fair trade values.
direction: Subtle, complex and smoky in flavor, our maca powder is the perfect addition to your favorite drinks, snacks and recipes. Stir it into coffees, teas and smoothies for added sweetness and complexity, or sprinkle it onto yogurt, ice cream or your favorite desserts.
ingredients: Organic gelatinized maca root.

Do not refrigerate.

Grape Seed Extract naturally contains polyphenols known as oligomeric proanthocyanidins (OPCs). These active ingredients also exist in many plants and herbs such as green tea, bilberry and cranberry, and are important to healthful traditions around the world. In addition to being cardio supportive, proanthocyanidin compounds possess antioxidant activity that help fight against free radicals in the body. Free radicals can cause oxidative stress which may damage cells.
direction: As a dietary supplement for adults, take one (1) vegetable capsule  two times daily, preferably with meals or as directed by a healthcare practitioner.
ingredients: Microcrystalline cellulose, vegetable cellulose, vegetable magnesium stearate, silica.

warnings: If you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications or have any medical condition, please consult your healthcare practitioner before taking any dietary supplement. Discontinue use and consult your healthcare practitioner if any adverse reactions occur. Keep out of reach of children. Store at room temperature. Frontier® Dandelion Root is a sunny, subtle, yet incredibly healing plant used for thousands of years in China and long prized by herbalists for its cleansing action. It is also packed with essential vitamins and minerals. Almost every herbal tradition has noted it as a useful tonic for the liver and gallbladder. Frontier Dandelion Root can be used fresh in green drinks, salads and stews in miniscule amounts to add nutritional value.
 Bulgaria
 Taraxacum officinale G.H. Weber ex Wigg.
DANDELION ROOT - Frontier Co-op offers high quality Dandelion Root (Taraxacum Officinale) in 1 pound bulk packaging. Dandelion Root is known for its cleansing actions and nutritional benefits packed with essential vitamins and minerals. The root is a quality addition to any cuisine or use for a cup of herbal tea. Our bulk Dandelion Root is kosher certified and non-irradiated.
DIGESTIVE HEALTH - Dandelion root has been used for thousands of years in China and is long prized by herbalists for its cleansing action. The traditional use for dandelion root is to support a healthy digestive system.
VERSATILE USES - While often used in teas, dandelion root is a great addition to incorporate in juices, salads, stews, and soups. Being packed with essential vitamins and minerals, dandelion root can add nutritional value as an ingredient to any recipe. Dandelion root can also be blended into other herbal tea blends, made as a coffee, or infused in DIY body care recipes.
ORIGIN/SOURCING - Dandelion root has been prized by herbalists for centuries. Our dandelion root is grown in Bulgaria and is kosher certified and non-irradiated.   
ABOUT US - Owned by stores and organizations that buy and sell our products, Frontier Co-op has been a member-owned cooperative since 1976. We support natural living and our products are never irradiated or treated with ETO (Ethylene Oxide) . We’re committed to the health and welfare of the environment and everyone producing and consuming our botanical products.
direction: To prepare as a tea, pour 8 oz. water in a pot and boil. Add 2 tsp. of herb, cover and simmer 10-20 minutes, strain and serve immediately.

Milk thistle's hard, dark-colored seeds are ground and used to make a tea or tincture, encapsulated, or added to foods. The whole seeds are also sometimes added to foods. The seeds have a slightly bitter, oily taste and a faint aroma. 
 Bulgaria
Silybum marianum (L.) Gaertn.
TOP-QUALITY MILK THISTLE SEED - Frontier Co-op organic milk thistle seed (Silybum marianum) has a long history of use, both as a food and for its wellness benefits. The nutty tasting seeds can be utilized in many different ways. Our bulk whole milk thistle seed is kosher certified and non-irradiated.
LIVER HEALTH - The liver works to keep the body free of harmful substances and toxins. The seeds have long been associated with wellness benefits and modern research has verified most of those historical uses. Milk thistle seed supports a healthy liver and historically has been used as a liver tonic and in various digestive formulas.
VERSATILE USES - Milk thistle seed can be consumed in many ways, as a tea, in capsules, as a tincture and of course in food. Use the whole seed to sprinkle on salads, sandwiches, and mix in with trail mix, or easily ground down the seed to incorporate into tea, baked goods, and smoothies.
ORIGIN/SOURCING - Used for centuries as food and for its healthful properties, milk thistle seed has a long tradition of use in herbalism. The seeds originate from Bulgaria and are harvested from the milk thistle seed pod once ripe and dried. The milk thistle plant itself can grow up to 4-5 feet tall and has lettuce like leaves with spiky purple flowers.
ABOUT US - Owned by stores and organizations that buy and sell our products, Frontier Co-op has been a member-owned cooperative since 1976. We support natural living and our products are never irradiated or treated with ETO. We're committed to the health and welfare of the environment and everyone producing and consuming our botanical products.

Nubian Heritage is the brainchild of two New York street vendors. In 1992, fresh out of college and without jobs, Rich and Nyema embarked on a mission to produce  luxurious natural products from traditional African recipes with fair trade ingredients. Today Nubian Heritage offers culturally authentic natural products inspired by global ancient healing philosophies. Although Nubian Heritage  products are no longer made in bath tubs, little else has changed; the company still makes its own product, still uses fair trade ingredient and still invests in community commerce.
Lemongrass, native to Southeast Asia, has been used in purification rituals for generations and revered  for its invigorating aroma. Steam-distilled Madagascan  Lemongrass has a strong history of use in Cuban, Indian and Brazilian folk medicine. Indigenous Australians have used the oil extracted from the Tea Tree's needles for its remarkable properties.

Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*
^May vary slightly from batch to batch
*Essential Amino Acids

2) Drain the water from the jar. Rinse seeds in fresh, lukewarm water and drain again. For well drained seeds/spouts, lay jar at an angle in a warm (70ºF), dark place.

3) Rinse and drain seeds twice a day. In hot and dry weather, you may need to rinse the seeds three times a day. In very humid weather, the seeds should be kept in a dry place. Turn jar over gently. Overturning the jar rapidly will cause shifting in the sprouting seeds. This can break the tender shoots and kill the spout. This breakage causes the sprout to spoil. Sprouts should be ready to eat in 3-5 days, depending on the seed used. Put in sunlight during the last day to add chlorophyll.

description:
Cold-Pressed Oil from a Natural Superfood
USDA Certified Organic
Ideal Medium-Heat Cooking Oil
Substitute for Butter and Olive Oil
External Use on Skin and Hair
Supports Brain Function and Ketogenic Diet*
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
No Hexane and No Pesticides
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
Coconut is a natural superfood, and its beneficial properties are present even in its oil. 
can be used both internally, adding it to dishes and using it for cooking, as well as externally on your hair and skin. No matter how you use it, you’ll be able to enjoy the benefits of this powerful superfood.
Coconut oil is a good source of medium chain triglycerides (MCTs), such as lauric, capric, and caprylic acids. Studies demonstrate that the MCTs found in coconut oil are supportive of energy production within the brain and, along with diet and exercise, can help to support weight loss with a ketogenic diet.*
Coconut oil can be used both internally and externally. It is an excellent option for a medium-heat cooking oil, ideal for use when baking or sauteing. You can also easily add it to numerous recipes as a replacement for butter or olive oil. It even makes an excellent addition to smoothies, shakes, and dressings by adding a light, tropical flavor. Externally, it can be used on the hair and skin to moisturize, tame frizz, and add a protective barrier.
 
 is sourced from the Philippines. It is made by cold pressing the liquid from coconut meat and then separating the oil without the use of bleach to produce a smooth, unrefined virgin oil. It is GMO, hexane, and pesticide free and packaged in plastic that is BPA and phthalate free.
direction: Our Organic, Unrefined, Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is ideal as a medium-heat cooking oil – best for baking or sautéing, but not suitable for frying. Simply add it to your shakes, smoothies, and salad dressings or use as a substitute for butter or olive oil. Our Coconut Oil is also excellent when used externally on skin and hair, and as a carrier oil for massage.
ingredients: Main Ingredients
Organic, Unrefined, Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Tree nuts (coconut).

Camu Camu (
) is a tropical superfruit indigenous to South American that can be found along the flooded areas of the Amazonian Rainforest which gives access to Native peoples to harvest the fruit directly into canoes. The Camu Camu tree has been planted along floodplains as part of reforestation projects because of their hardiness and their productivity as a food source.
 is a dry milled whole berry powder sourced from Peru. Camu Camu Berries are known to contain a wide variety of naturally occurring phytonutrients such as Vitamin C and polyphenolic antioxidant-like compounds such as flavonoids. The tart sour taste can add a twist in recipes that call for lemon, lime and other citrus-like flavors.
Scoop it. Blend it. Sprinkle it. Bake it. It’s that simple.
Pairs well with: Banana, Carrot, Orange, Raspberries, Strawberries, Sweet Potato
direction: Use one serving daily. Blend with shakes or smoothies. Sprinkle over yogurt or oatmeal. Bake in your favorite recipes.

Iron is an important mineral that helps the body carry out many processes, especially those related to the blood and cardiovascular system.* 
 
 can help you get enough iron to support these processes using a special form of iron that is recognized as gentle on the stomach.*
Ferrochel® iron is formulated to be gentle on the stomach and has been clinically shown to help restore iron levels in anemic subjects.* If you are iron deficient, taking a daily iron supplement can help keep your levels at an appropriate level. Iron plays a prominent role in many life-sustaining functions, as it is an essential element for blood production.* In addition, it is vital to the proper function of hemoglobin, a protein which is needed to transport oxygen from the lungs through the bloodstream to the tissues of the body.*

POPPY SEED - Frontier Co-op Whole Organic Poppy Seeds (Papaver somniferum) are a versatile addition to your meals. While poppy seeds are available in a wide variety of colors, these poppy seeds are a uniform blue-black to stand out proudly on any dish.

FLAVORFUL AND CRUNCHY - Frontier Co-op Whole Organic Poppy Seeds provide a nutty aroma and flavor to whatever you’re cooking or baking. Poppy seeds also add an unmistakable crunchy texture to baked goods and sauces.
CERTIFIED ORGANIC - These whole organic poppy seeds are certified organic, kosher, and non-irradiated. There are no artificial additives or chemicals used at any stage of harvesting and manufacturing.
ABOUT US - Frontier Co-op began in 1976 as a two-person operation and has grown as a leader in high quality natural and organic botanicals. We are a member-owned Co-op that supports natural living. Our success throughout the years reflects our close harmony with the product needs and the values of our members and consumers and our commitment to selling only the most pure, high quality ingredients.

The essential amino acid L-tryptophan helps support relaxation, restful sleep, and feeling better. It plays a part in the synthesis of both melatonin and serotonin, hormones involved with mood and stress response. L-Tryptophan also supports immune functions because it is the body's precursor to the kynurenines that regulate immunity. If needed, L-tryptophan converts to niacin in the body, which supports circulation, a healthy nervous system, the metabolism of food, and the production of hydrochloric acid for the digestive system. Source Naturals L-Tryptophan is extremely pure and is regularly tested to ensure the highest standards of quality.

TOP-QUALITY MILK THISTLE SEED - Frontier Co-op organic milk thistle seed (Silybum marianum) has a long history of use, both as a food and for its wellness benefits. The nutty tasting seeds can be utilized in many different ways. Our bulk whole milk thistle seed is kosher certified and non-irradiated.
LIVER HEALTH - The liver works to keep the body free of harmful substances and toxins. The seeds have long been associated with wellness benefits and modern research has verified most of those historical uses. Milk thistle seed supports a healthy liver and historically has been used as a liver tonic and in various digestive formulas.
VERSATILE USES - Milk thistle seed can be consumed in many ways, as a tea, in capsules, as a tincture and of course in food. Use the whole seed to sprinkle on salads, sandwiches, and mix in with trail mix, or easily ground down the seed to incorporate into tea, baked goods, and smoothies.
ORIGIN/SOURCING - Used for centuries as food and for its healthful properties, milk thistle seed has a long tradition of use in herbalism. The seeds originate from Bulgaria and are harvested from the milk thistle seed pod once ripe and dried. The milk thistle plant itself can grow up to 4-5 feet tall and has lettuce like leaves with spiky purple flowers.

description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*

ONION POWDER - Frontier Co-op Organic Onion Powder (Allium cepa) has all the flavor of real onion without the hassle or the tears. The taste of onions has been appreciated for all of recorded history, and today onions are found in virtually every cuisine throughout the world. There are many varieties, and they play many roles--from primary ingredient to condiment to seasoning.
VERSATILE USES - Onion powder is often used in place of fresh onions to prepare many meals. It’s also a great way to spice up condiments. This powder delivers a taste and aroma that is up to 10 times stronger than raw onions. Our onion powder can be used in a variety of kitchen dishes and delivers a powerful onion flavor and aroma that spices up any recipe. It's perfect for those who don't want watery eyes or don't have time to peel and chop whole onions.
POTENT FLAVOR - Onion powder comes from freshly ground onions, but only after they have been peeled and dried at the right temperature. The powder brings out a strong onion scent and taste in a quick and convenient way. It provides a robust flavor for even the simplest recipes.
FROM THE UNITED STATES - Frontier Co-op onion powder is obtained from freshly picked onions that are dried out and ground to deliver the best flavor possible. Our onion powder is Kosher certified and 100% non-irradiated. It does not contain any additives or chemicals.

Herbal extracts have long been used in traditional medicine for their potential healing properties and health benefits. 
brings together the power of two of these extracts, boswellia and turmeric, to help support a balanced immune response.*
Boswellia extract (Boswellia serrata), also known as frankincense, is a resinous botanical containing bioactive components, like boswellia acids. These acids have shown in scientific studies to help support a balanced immune response and may be helpful for joint and general aches and pains throughout the body.* Turmeric root (Curcuma longa) is another botanical with beneficial properties.  Research suggests that it is the curcuminoids within the turmeric root and rhizome that account for its supportive anti-inflammatory effects.*
 
 features Boswellin® Boswellia Extract, turmeric extract, and turmeric powder in veggie capsules. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy.

description:
Cold-Pressed Oil from a Natural Superfood
USDA Certified Organic
Ideal Medium-Heat Cooking Oil
Substitute for Butter and Olive Oil
External Use on Skin and Hair
Supports Brain Function and Ketogenic Diet*
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
No Hexane and No Pesticides
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
Coconut is a natural superfood, and its beneficial properties are present even in its oil. 
can be used both internally, adding it to dishes and using it for cooking, as well as externally on your hair and skin. No matter how you use it, you’ll be able to enjoy the benefits of this powerful superfood.
Coconut oil is a good source of medium chain triglycerides (MCTs), such as lauric, capric, and caprylic acids. Studies demonstrate that the MCTs found in coconut oil are supportive of energy production within the brain and, along with diet and exercise, can help to support weight loss with a ketogenic diet.*
Coconut oil can be used both internally and externally. It is an excellent option for a medium-heat cooking oil, ideal for use when baking or sauteing. You can also easily add it to numerous recipes as a replacement for butter or olive oil. It even makes an excellent addition to smoothies, shakes, and dressings by adding a light, tropical flavor. Externally, it can be used on the hair and skin to moisturize, tame frizz, and add a protective barrier.
 
 is sourced from the Philippines. It is made by cold pressing the liquid from coconut meat and then separating the oil without the use of bleach to produce a smooth, unrefined virgin oil. It is GMO, hexane, and pesticide free and packaged in plastic that is BPA and phthalate free.
direction: Our Organic, Unrefined, Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is ideal as a medium-heat cooking oil – best for baking or sautéing, but not suitable for frying. Simply add it to your shakes, smoothies, and salad dressings or use as a substitute for butter or olive oil. Our Coconut Oil is also excellent when used externally on skin and hair, and as a carrier oil for massage.
ingredients: Main Ingredients
Organic, Unrefined, Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Tree nuts (coconut).

100% Gold Guarantee.
Vitamin D3 is the body’s preferred form of vitamin D, and it can help to support many aspects of health. 
 
 contains this preferred form of vitamin D. When taken daily, this supplement may help to support bone and immune health.*
Vitamin D is often referred to as  the “sunshine vitamin” because it is produced in the skin in response to sunlight. It is an essential vitamin for many metabolic processes that help support the body. Vitamin D3 can help to regulate the absorption of calcium and phosphorus, both of which are needed for strong and healthy bones and teeth. In addition it can help support healthy immune system function.*
 
 is a high-potency vitamin D supplement and contains cholecalciferol from lanolin in fish gelatin softgels. It is formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy.
direction: Take 1 softgel daily, with food. Best when taken as directed by a qualified healthcare professional. Do not exceed one softgel daily or take with other dietary supplements containing Vitamin D.

Safflower Oil and Fish Gelatin Softgel (Gelatin, Vegetable Glycerin, Purified Water).
warnings: This is a high potency Vitamin D product. Consult with a licensed physician, pharmacist, naturopath or other qualified healthcare professional prior to using this product if you are pregnant, nursing, taking prescription medications, have diagnosed medical conditions (e.g., hypercalcemia or kidney disease), or require higher Vitamin D intake.

 contains multiple omega-3s, including DHA and EPA, which can help you get plenty of these nutrients daily, promoting the health of many systems in the body.*

Blue-green algae is considered a green superfood because it contains many supportive nutrients. description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*

 features this powerful extract and helps promote several aspects of overall health when taken daily.*

description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*

Camu Camu (
) is a tropical superfruit indigenous to South American that can be found along the flooded areas of the Amazonian Rainforest which gives access to Native peoples to harvest the fruit directly into canoes. The Camu Camu tree has been planted along floodplains as part of reforestation projects because of their hardiness and their productivity as a food source.
 is a dry milled whole berry powder sourced from Peru. Camu Camu Berries are known to contain a wide variety of naturally occurring phytonutrients such as Vitamin C and polyphenolic antioxidant-like compounds such as flavonoids. The tart sour taste can add a twist in recipes that call for lemon, lime and other citrus-like flavors.
Scoop it. Blend it. Sprinkle it. Bake it. It’s that simple.
Pairs well with: Banana, Carrot, Orange, Raspberries, Strawberries, Sweet Potato

description:
Cold-Pressed Oil from a Natural Superfood
USDA Certified Organic
Ideal Medium-Heat Cooking Oil
Substitute for Butter and Olive Oil
External Use on Skin and Hair
Supports Brain Function and Ketogenic Diet*
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
No Hexane and No Pesticides
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
Coconut is a natural superfood, and its beneficial properties are present even in its oil. 
can be used both internally, adding it to dishes and using it for cooking, as well as externally on your hair and skin. No matter how you use it, you’ll be able to enjoy the benefits of this powerful superfood.
Coconut oil is a good source of medium chain triglycerides (MCTs), such as lauric, capric, and caprylic acids. Studies demonstrate that the MCTs found in coconut oil are supportive of energy production within the brain and, along with diet and exercise, can help to support weight loss with a ketogenic diet.*
Coconut oil can be used both internally and externally. It is an excellent option for a medium-heat cooking oil, ideal for use when baking or sauteing. You can also easily add it to numerous recipes as a replacement for butter or olive oil. It even makes an excellent addition to smoothies, shakes, and dressings by adding a light, tropical flavor. Externally, it can be used on the hair and skin to moisturize, tame frizz, and add a protective barrier.
 
 is sourced from the Philippines. It is made by cold pressing the liquid from coconut meat and then separating the oil without the use of bleach to produce a smooth, unrefined virgin oil. It is GMO, hexane, and pesticide free and packaged in plastic that is BPA and phthalate free.
direction: Our Organic, Unrefined, Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is ideal as a medium-heat cooking oil – best for baking or sautéing, but not suitable for frying. Simply add it to your shakes, smoothies, and salad dressings or use as a substitute for butter or olive oil. Our Coconut Oil is also excellent when used externally on skin and hair, and as a carrier oil for massage.
ingredients: Main Ingredients
Organic, Unrefined, Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Tree nuts (coconut).

Iron is an important mineral that helps the body carry out many processes, especially those related to the blood and cardiovascular system.* 
 
 can help you get enough iron to support these processes using a special form of iron that is recognized as gentle on the stomach.*
Ferrochel® iron is formulated to be gentle on the stomach and has been clinically shown to help restore iron levels in anemic subjects.* If you are iron deficient, taking a daily iron supplement can help keep your levels at an appropriate level. Iron plays a prominent role in many life-sustaining functions, as it is an essential element for blood production.* In addition, it is vital to the proper function of hemoglobin, a protein which is needed to transport oxygen from the lungs through the bloodstream to the tissues of the body.*
 
 features Ferrochel® Ferrous Bisglycinate Chelate, a form of iron that is gentle and non-constipating.* It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy.

Flaxseed offers the benefits of fiber, Omega-3 fatty acid Alpha-Linolenic Acid ALA, protein and SDG lignans. Fiber promotes regularity, supports normal functioning of the digestive tract and lipids within normal levels. ALA is an Omega-3 essential fatty acid that helps support normal cardiovascular function and helps to maintain healthy hair, skin and nails. 
Spectrum Essentials® Brand Flaxseeds are premium quality organic seeds that have been carefully selected for their nutritive content. Flaxseed is a highly concentrated source of SDG lignans— the amount of SDG lignans can vary depending on seasonal variation in growing conditions. These select seeds are meticulously cleaned using a three-part process to remove low weight, broken and dirty seeds commonly found in bulk bins. 
Only Spectrum Essentials® brand uses a proprietary milling process that finely slices the seed, rather than crushing it, thereby preventing the loss of valuable nutrients from oxidation. The sliced seed is immediately packaged in this light protective pouch and airtight sealed to ensure optimum nutritive benefits and product freshness.

description:
The Essential Beauty Protein
Pasture-Raised & Non-GMO
Replenish your Body's Collagen Supply for Lasting Beauty and Youthfulness
Contains bovine-derived ingredients.
Food is life. We depend on it for sustenance, for pleasure, for culture and wellbeing. And yet our modern lifestyles and industrialized food can sometimes make our Earth's most basic, soul-strengthening nutrients seem out of reach.
Earthtone foods is here to bring those amazing ingredients back into your life. We know the best nourishment comes straight from the heart of nature, not science labs. We also prioritize amazing nutrition over costly marketing campaigns. By making nature's nutrients accessible to all, we're here to make sure modern living can also mean a great life.
It's easy to forget, but true beauty lives in the most basic of elements: your skin, your hair, the right nutrients to nourish your body. Collagen is your body's foundational beauty protein By replenishing the collagen production that starts to decline in your 20s, you'll restore your glowing skin, healthy hair, strong nails, and pliable joints. Just add two spoonfuls to your daily routine for a youthfulness that lasts.
direction: Stir one or two teaspoons of collagen into coffee, smoothies, and other beverages until fully dissolved.

description:
Joint Support
 Important Joint Lubricant
With MSM
Non-GMO
A Dietary Supplement
Vegetarian/Vegan
Kosher
General Health
Family Owned Since 1968
GMP Quality Assured.
Hyaluronic Acid is a compound present in every tissue of the body, with the highest concentrations occurring in connective tissues such as skin and cartilage. Hyaluronic Acid is an important constituent of joint fluid, where it serves as a lubricant and plays a role in resisting compressive forces. MSM was added to the product as a natural sulfur compound, offering the chemical links needed to form and maintain connective tissues in the human body including articular cartilage.

French chicory, the roasted root often added to coffee, blended with dandelion, the renowned detox herb, and Spanish carob famed for its chocolately flavor. Enriched with California´s almonds, dates, figs, and orange peel, Teeccino makes a delicious cup of tea...or is it coffee? We´ll let you decide!

When it comes to grains, beans and seeds, we think nature got it right. In their original state, these wholesome foods provide a magnificent combination of nutrients that are essential to health. We honor this innate perfection by keeping our foods simple, and our chis seeds are an excellent example of that practice. They are simply seeds from the chia plant - nothing added or removed. They're great in puddings and smoothies, sprinkled on top of porridge and salads, and added to baked goods in place of flaxseed meal or poppy seeds. What more, Bob's Red Mill Chia Seeds contain 4280 mg of Omega-3 fatty acids.
Take a look at the ingredients-or rather, the ingredient. That's right. There's only one: chia seeds. It doesn't get much simpler than that. And we think that's just how it should be. 
-To your good health, Bob Moore

description:
Calm & Relax Formula
Featuring Patented Sensoril
Plus California Poppy, Magnolia and Chamomile Extract
Dietary Supplement.
 is designed to help you maintain a healthy sleep cycle without using a melatonin based sleep aid. This product has been formulated for those who experience occasional sleeplessness and are looking for a natural solution that will help them relax, sleep more soundly and wake up refreshed!
At the center of this formula is Sensoril®, a patented extract that has been studied for its ability to relax your mind and body, leading you to enter a more balanced state of being. *By accessing this state, you allow your body to enter more readily into a restful sleep.
This comprehensive formula also features powerful ingredients to help promote a more balanced sleep. 5-Hydroxytryptophan (5-HTP), the direct precursor to Serotonin, is a naturally occurring amino acid that is plant derived. *It helps support the body to naturally produce this hormone that is involved in maintaining a healthy sleep cycle. L-Theanine helps to reduce the effects of stress and increases alpha brain waves.
also features ingredients that are known for their traditional use in natural sleep aid formulas, such as California Poppy and Passionflower extracts. It also includes Chamomile flower and Magnolia bark extracts which are often found in natural sleep aid formulas.
Use for occasional sleeplessness or daily to promote relaxation before bedtime.

Frontier® Dandelion Root is a sunny, subtle, yet incredibly healing plant used for thousands of years in China and long prized by herbalists for its cleansing action. It is also packed with essential vitamins and minerals. Almost every herbal tradition has noted it as a useful tonic for the liver and gallbladder. Frontier Dandelion Root can be used fresh in green drinks, salads and stews in miniscule amounts to add nutritional value.
 Bulgaria
 Taraxacum officinale G.H. Weber ex Wigg.
DANDELION ROOT - Frontier Co-op offers high quality Dandelion Root (Taraxacum Officinale) in 1 pound bulk packaging. Dandelion Root is known for its cleansing actions and nutritional benefits packed with essential vitamins and minerals. The root is a quality addition to any cuisine or use for a cup of herbal tea. Our bulk Dandelion Root is kosher certified and non-irradiated.
DIGESTIVE HEALTH - Dandelion root has been used for thousands of years in China and is long prized by herbalists for its cleansing action. The traditional use for dandelion root is to support a healthy digestive system.
VERSATILE USES - While often used in teas, dandelion root is a great addition to incorporate in juices, salads, stews, and soups. Being packed with essential vitamins and minerals, dandelion root can add nutritional value as an ingredient to any recipe. Dandelion root can also be blended into other herbal tea blends, made as a coffee, or infused in DIY body care recipes.
ORIGIN/SOURCING - Dandelion root has been prized by herbalists for centuries. Our dandelion root is grown in Bulgaria and is kosher certified and non-irradiated.   
ABOUT US - Owned by stores and organizations that buy and sell our products, Frontier Co-op has been a member-owned cooperative since 1976. We support natural living and our products are never irradiated or treated with ETO (Ethylene Oxide) . We’re committed to the health and welfare of the environment and everyone producing and consuming our botanical products.

ChildLife® Liquid Calcium with Magnesium provides these two essential minerals combined with Vitamin D and Zinc in a balanced, absorbable, great tasting formula. These are the primary nutrients required for supporting your child's healthy bone growth and development. 
Health Tip: As your child grows and develops, Calcium is the most abundant mineral found in their body, (comprising approx. 2% of total body weight), with 99% of the total calcium being found in the bones and teeth. description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*

Camu Camu (
) is a tropical superfruit indigenous to South American that can be found along the flooded areas of the Amazonian Rainforest which gives access to Native peoples to harvest the fruit directly into canoes. The Camu Camu tree has been planted along floodplains as part of reforestation projects because of their hardiness and their productivity as a food source.
 is a dry milled whole berry powder sourced from Peru. Camu Camu Berries are known to contain a wide variety of naturally occurring phytonutrients such as Vitamin C and polyphenolic antioxidant-like compounds such as flavonoids. The tart sour taste can add a twist in recipes that call for lemon, lime and other citrus-like flavors.
Scoop it. Blend it. Sprinkle it. Bake it. It’s that simple.
Pairs well with: Banana, Carrot, Orange, Raspberries, Strawberries, Sweet Potato

description:
Cold-Pressed Oil from a Natural Superfood
USDA Certified Organic
Ideal Medium-Heat Cooking Oil
Substitute for Butter and Olive Oil
External Use on Skin and Hair
Supports Brain Function and Ketogenic Diet*
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
No Hexane and No Pesticides
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
Coconut is a natural superfood, and its beneficial properties are present even in its oil. 
can be used both internally, adding it to dishes and using it for cooking, as well as externally on your hair and skin. No matter how you use it, you’ll be able to enjoy the benefits of this powerful superfood.
Coconut oil is a good source of medium chain triglycerides (MCTs), such as lauric, capric, and caprylic acids. Studies demonstrate that the MCTs found in coconut oil are supportive of energy production within the brain and, along with diet and exercise, can help to support weight loss with a ketogenic diet.*
Coconut oil can be used both internally and externally. It is an excellent option for a medium-heat cooking oil, ideal for use when baking or sauteing. You can also easily add it to numerous recipes as a replacement for butter or olive oil. It even makes an excellent addition to smoothies, shakes, and dressings by adding a light, tropical flavor. Externally, it can be used on the hair and skin to moisturize, tame frizz, and add a protective barrier.
 
 is sourced from the Philippines. It is made by cold pressing the liquid from coconut meat and then separating the oil without the use of bleach to produce a smooth, unrefined virgin oil. It is GMO, hexane, and pesticide free and packaged in plastic that is BPA and phthalate free.
direction: Our Organic, Unrefined, Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is ideal as a medium-heat cooking oil – best for baking or sautéing, but not suitable for frying. Simply add it to your shakes, smoothies, and salad dressings or use as a substitute for butter or olive oil. Our Coconut Oil is also excellent when used externally on skin and hair, and as a carrier oil for massage.
ingredients: Main Ingredients
Organic, Unrefined, Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Tree nuts (coconut).

Iron is an important mineral that helps the body carry out many processes, especially those related to the blood and cardiovascular system.* 
 
 can help you get enough iron to support these processes using a special form of iron that is recognized as gentle on the stomach.*
Ferrochel® iron is formulated to be gentle on the stomach and has been clinically shown to help restore iron levels in anemic subjects.* If you are iron deficient, taking a daily iron supplement can help keep your levels at an appropriate level. Iron plays a prominent role in many life-sustaining functions, as it is an essential element for blood production.* In addition, it is vital to the proper function of hemoglobin, a protein which is needed to transport oxygen from the lungs through the bloodstream to the tissues of the body.*
 
 features Ferrochel® Ferrous Bisglycinate Chelate, a form of iron that is gentle and non-constipating.* It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy.

Flaxseed offers the benefits of fiber, Omega-3 fatty acid Alpha-Linolenic Acid ALA, protein and SDG lignans. Fiber promotes regularity, supports normal functioning of the digestive tract and lipids within normal levels. ALA is an Omega-3 essential fatty acid that helps support normal cardiovascular function and helps to maintain healthy hair, skin and nails. 
Spectrum Essentials® Brand Flaxseeds are premium quality organic seeds that have been carefully selected for their nutritive content. Flaxseed is a highly concentrated source of SDG lignans— the amount of SDG lignans can vary depending on seasonal variation in growing conditions. These select seeds are meticulously cleaned using a three-part process to remove low weight, broken and dirty seeds commonly found in bulk bins. 
Only Spectrum Essentials® brand uses a proprietary milling process that finely slices the seed, rather than crushing it, thereby preventing the loss of valuable nutrients from oxidation. The sliced seed is immediately packaged in this light protective pouch and airtight sealed to ensure optimum nutritive benefits and product freshness.

Hyaluronic Acid is a compound present in every tissue of the body, with the highest concentrations occurring in connective tissues such as skin and cartilage.  is designed to help you maintain a healthy sleep cycle without using a melatonin based sleep aid. This product has been formulated for those who experience occasional sleeplessness and are looking for a natural solution that will help them relax, sleep more soundly and wake up refreshed!

Enjoy Teeccino's deliciously rich, deep-roasted flavor that delivers all the satisfaction without the caffeine and acidity of coffee! Discover why Teeccino fans describe it as smoother, richer, and creamier than coffee. The secret? French chicory, the roasted root often added to coffee, blended with barley, Italy's favorite caffeine-free roasted brew, and Spanish carob, famed for its chocolaty flavor. Enriched with maca, the Peruvian energizing herb, a cup of Teeccino brims with many health benefits:
Most of Teeccino's ingredients are grown in Europe and the USA. We pioneer new trade for organic chicory with smallholder farmers in India and for wild harvested ramón seeds with rainforest villagers in Central America. These ingredients create economic opportunities where income is scarce. By drinking Teeccino, you join us in supporting families devoted to organic, fair trade values in both developed and emerging countries.

Permanent filters work best and save trees!
Add 1-2 Tbsp to '3-cup' pots, 3-4 Tbsp to '8-cup' pots. Steep for 3 minutes.

Chill brewed Teeccino. Teeccino can last days when refrigerated! Or, make a strong brew by using 2 Tbsp per 2 cups water and pour the hot brew over ice. Add cold milk or nondairy milk and sweeten to taste.
Begin brewing 3/4 coffee to 1/4 Teeccino. Gradually decrease coffee and increase Teeccino until you are caffeine-free!

Maca Powder has been an important staple in the diet of indigenous Andean cultures for over 2,000 years. It grows at altitudes above 10,000 feet where little else survives. Maca is a root vegetable and believed to help increase energy, reduce fatigue and improve libido. Ancient Incan warriors were legendary for consuming generous amounts of maca in preparation for battle, significantly maximizing their stamina and energy levels. Maca is an adaptogen, facilitating the body's ability to adapt to and regulate stress responses and balance hormones. Today athletes, of all types benefit from daily maca consumption. Earth Circle Organics' Maca powder is 100% raw and certified organic. Packed with vitamins and minerals for health and sustained energy.

When it comes to grains, beans and seeds, we think nature got it right. In their original state, these wholesome foods provide a magnificent combination of nutrients that are essential to health. We honor this innate perfection by keeping our foods simple, and our chis seeds are an excellent example of that practice. They are simply seeds from the chia plant - nothing added or removed. They're great in puddings and smoothies, sprinkled on top of porridge and salads, and added to baked goods in place of flaxseed meal or poppy seeds. What more, Bob's Red Mill Chia Seeds contain 4280 mg of Omega-3 fatty acids.
Take a look at the ingredients-or rather, the ingredient. That's right. There's only one: chia seeds. It doesn't get much simpler than that. And we think that's just how it should be. 
-To your good health, Bob Moore

Your liver plays a vital role in your body, as its main function is to filter the blood and remove any waste products or harmful toxins. For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. 
 
 uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.*

) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits.  is formulated with 5 herbal extracts and BioPerine®, a black pepper extract that helps improve absorption. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy.

Medium chain triglycerides, or MCTs, are nutritious fats that the body can quickly burn for energy, making them a vital source of fuel. 
 
contains MCTs sourced from organic coconut oil, allowing you to easily add an extra energy kick to salad dressings, smoothies, and other favorite recipes. It is an excellent source of plant-based brain and body fuel and is a popular choice for athletes and those looking to lose weight.*
Coconut oil is a healthy source of MCTs and contains caprylic acid and capric acid, two types of medium chain triglycerides that the body can convert into ketones and use for fuel. This means MCTs can act as an important fuel source and can help support a Ketogenic diet.* Research into the health benefits of a Ketogenic diet suggest a range of benefits, from weight loss to athletic endurance and cognitive focus.*
 
contains multiple MCTs from organic coconut oil, including caprylic and capric acid. It contains no gluten, GMOS, palm, or soy.

direction: 1) Place two tablespoons of sprouting seeds or 1/2 cup of legumes/grains in a sprouting jar with three times as much water as seeds. Soak overnight. For many small seeds, five hours of soaking is sufficient.
2) Drain the water from the jar. Rinse seeds in fresh, lukewarm water and drain again. For well drained seeds/spouts, lay jar at an angle in a warm (70ºF), dark place.

3) Rinse and drain seeds twice a day. In hot and dry weather, you may need to rinse the seeds three times a day. In very humid weather, the seeds should be kept in a dry place. Turn jar over gently. Overturning the jar rapidly will cause shifting in the sprouting seeds. This can break the tender shoots and kill the spout. This breakage causes the sprout to spoil. Sprouts should be ready to eat in 3-5 days, depending on the seed used. Put in sunlight during the last day to add chlorophyll.

description:
Cold-Pressed Oil from a Natural Superfood
USDA Certified Organic
Ideal Medium-Heat Cooking Oil
Substitute for Butter and Olive Oil
External Use on Skin and Hair
Supports Brain Function and Ketogenic Diet*
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans

No Hexane and No Pesticides
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
Coconut is a natural superfood, and its beneficial properties are present even in its oil. 
can be used both internally, adding it to dishes and using it for cooking, as well as externally on your hair and skin. No matter how you use it, you’ll be able to enjoy the benefits of this powerful superfood.
Coconut oil is a good source of medium chain triglycerides (MCTs), such as lauric, capric, and caprylic acids. Studies demonstrate that the MCTs found in coconut oil are supportive of energy production within the brain and, along with diet and exercise, can help to support weight loss with a ketogenic diet.*
Coconut oil can be used both internally and externally. It is an excellent option for a medium-heat cooking oil, ideal for use when baking or sauteing. You can also easily add it to numerous recipes as a replacement for butter or olive oil. It even makes an excellent addition to smoothies, shakes, and dressings by adding a light, tropical flavor. Externally, it can be used on the hair and skin to moisturize, tame frizz, and add a protective barrier.
 
 is sourced from the Philippines. It is made by cold pressing the liquid from coconut meat and then separating the oil without the use of bleach to produce a smooth, unrefined virgin oil. It is GMO, hexane, and pesticide free and packaged in plastic that is BPA and phthalate free.
direction: Our Organic, Unrefined, Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is ideal as a medium-heat cooking oil – best for baking or sautéing, but not suitable for frying. Simply add it to your shakes, smoothies, and salad dressings or use as a substitute for butter or olive oil. Our Coconut Oil is also excellent when used externally on skin and hair, and as a carrier oil for massage.

Organic, Unrefined, Cold Pressed Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Tree nuts (coconut).

description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*

Formulated Without: Gluten or GMOs
Supports Joint Mobility and Comfort*
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
 
is an upgraded inflammation support formula that features  fish oil concentrate that provides omega-3 fatty acids, black cumin seed oil, turmeric extract, boswellia extract, and ginger extract in fish gelatin softgels.
direction: Take 1 softgel daily, with food. Best when taken as directed by a qualified healthcare professional.
ingredients: Fish Oil Concentrate, Nigella Seed Oil (Nigella sativa), Turmeric Extract (Curcuma longa) (rhizome) (min. 23% Curcuminoids), Indian Frankincense Extract (Boswellia serrata) (gum resin) (min. 20% AKBA), Ginger Extract (Zingiber officinale) (rhizome) (Oleoresin Std. to 50% Gingerols + Shogaols)

Fish Gelatin Softgel (Gelatin, Vegetable Glycerin, Purified Water, Sodium Copper Chlorophyllin (Color)), Yellow Beeswax, Sunflower Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Stearic Acid, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Silicon Dioxide (Silica), and Mixed Tocopherols.
warnings: Consult with a licensed physician, pharmacist, naturopath or other qualified healthcare professional prior to taking dietary supplements.

description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides.
, 16.37 oz (464 g) contains ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
direction: Mix 1 scoop daily in 6-8 ounces of room temperature water or juice and mix well (for best results, mix in a blender bottle). Drink on an empty stomach at least 1 hour before or 2 hours after meals. Best when taken as directed by a qualified healthcare professional.
5 grams per scoop is an average. Individual scooping technique may yield slightly less than or slightly more than 5 grams.
ingredients: Vitamin C (as Calcium Ascorbate), Sodium, Hydrolyzed Marine Collagen Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid (as Sodium Hyaluronate)
None

description:
Featuring Gold C™, a USP Grade Form of Vitamin C
Convenient Liquid Supplement for Kids
Natural Tart Orange Flavor
Immune System Support*
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee.
Vitamin C is an essential vitamin that’s an important part of a healthy diet, especially for children. 
makes it easy for kids to get their daily dose of vitamin C, which can help support the immune system.*
is formulated with our Gold C™, a USP grade vitamin C that is quality tested to meet strict specifications. It is a great tasting and convenient way to add more vitamin C to your child’s diet!
direction: Children 4 years and older take 1 teaspoon daily, with or without food. Best when taken as directed by a qualified healthcare professional. Shake well before use. Give directly or mix with your child's favorite drink.
ingredients: Vitamin C (as Ascorbic Acid)
Purified Water, Fructose, Vegetable Glycerin, Natural Flavor, Potassium Sorbate (as Preservative), Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, and Potassium Bicarbonate.

description:
Made with Organic Matcha Green Tea Leaves Sourced from Kagoshima, Japan
Featuring Naturally-Occurring Phytonutrients
Perfect for Making Matcha Drinks, and Adding to Shakes, Smoothies, Oatmeal, and Other Recipes
Supports a Healthy and Active Lifestyle*
Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans.
 
 makes it easy to create both hot and iced matcha drinks and provides a convenient way to add more matcha to any of your favorite recipes.
direction: Take one serving daily. Add 1 tsp to 4-6 ounces of hot water at around 175°F (79°C), mixing thoroughly; or prepare it cold, mixing and/or shaking well. Blend with shakes or smoothies. Sprinkle over yogurt or oatmeal. Bake in your favorite recipes.
2 grams per tsp is an average. Individual may yield less or more than scooping technique 2 grams.
ingredients: Organic Matcha Green Tea Powder
None

description:
Supports a Good Night's Sleep
Herbal Supplement
Non-GMO Project Verified
USDA Organic
Rainforest Alliance Certified Rooibos
Vegan
Certified B Corporation
Kosher
Certified Organic by QAI, Inc..
Formulated to support relaxation, Chamomile Flower, Skullcap and L-Theanine are blended to help calm the body and mind for a good night's sleep. Sweet Rooibos, Caramel and Vanilla flavors combine for a delicious and warming tea. Unwind with a cup of our Soothing Caramel Bedtime® tea.
At Yogi, it's about more than creating deliciously purposeful teas.
We blend with intention. Our flavorful teas are created to support body and mind.
We believe in the synergistic benefit of herbs, combining ingredients to enhance their wellness-supporting potential.
We blend the best of what nature has to offer using the finest spices and botanicals from around the globe.
direction: Bring water to boiling and steep 7 minutes. For a stronger tea, use 2 tea bags. Drink before bedtime.
ingredients: Organic caramel flavor, organic vanilla flavor, organic cinnamon bark oil, organic cardamom seed oil, organic ginger root oil.
warnings: Consult your healthcare provider prior to use if you are pregnant or nursing.
